page.title: 09STAN'S SHOP-ST.MARTINS
page.content: {Stan's shop}is the largest shop in St.Martins.It sells{food,}paint, drink,gardening things and many other items. There are{31 people}who work in{Stan's {shop.}The shop employs{28 people full {-time}and{3 part time.}Most of these are female. {Stan's shop}is open from 8.30.a.m.to 8.00.p.m.every day but closes at 1.00p.m.on Wednesday when most people go shopping in Oswestry.People travel to shop at{Stan's}from a lot of other villages. The busiest day of the week is Saturday. We have written some{prices}down- _sugar{43p}kilo, bread{32p}800 g loaf, tea{48p}125g, eggs{29p}for half a dozen and cheese{Â£1.20}/1b (450g). There is a large free car park with space for 180 cars.
